resources.string: Sorry, I don\'t think you understood the instructions. The point is to NOT die. Try to do better next time!
NO, NO, NO! Don\'t Die! How hard can it be?
I think you are looking for a game called "Die", maybe you misread, but this one is called "Don't Die".
You\'d better stop dying now or I\'ll start showing ads!
Were you not paying attention during the tutorial? You are NOT supposed to hit the ceiling. Ceiling is "BAD"!
What was that? Were you trying to catch the weapon? Don\'t try to catch the weapon! You need to dodge it!
I thought you would know by now. If you touch anything sharp you will die. Stay away from sharp objects!
